required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Disitamab Vedotin in Subjects With HER2 Expressing Urothelial Carcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2 Multi Cohort, Open Label, Multi-Center Clinical Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of Disitamab Vedotin (RC48 ADC) in Subjects With HER2 Expressing Locally Advanced Unresectable or Metastatic Urothelial Carcinoma

brief_summary.textblock:
This study is being done to see if a drug called disitamab vedotin works to treat HER2 expressing urothelial cancer. It will also test how safe the drug is for participants.
Participants will have cancer that has spread in the body near where it started (locally advanced) and cannot be removed (unresectable) or has spread through the body (metastatic).
It will also study what side effects happen when participants get the drug. A side effect is anything a drug does to your body besides treating the disease.

primary_outcome.measure: Confirmed Objective Response Rate (cORR) per Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST) version 1.1 (v1.1) by independent central review (ICR)
primary_outcome.description: The proportion of subjects with confirmed complete response (CR) or partial response (PR) according to RECIST v1.1

secondary_outcome.measure: cORR per RECIST v1.1 by investigator assessment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Duration of treatment; approximately 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: The proportion of subjects with confirmed CR or PR according to RECIST v1.1

secondary_outcome.measure: Confirmed Duration of Response (DOR) per RECIST v1.1 by ICR
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From start of treatment to completion of response assessment; approximately 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: The time from first documentation of objective tumor response (confirmed CR or PR) to the first documentation of tumor progression per RECIST v1.1 or death due to any cause.

secondary_outcome.measure: Confirmed DOR per RECIST v1.1 by investigator assessment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From start of treatment to completion of response assessment; approximately 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: The time from first documentation of objective tumor response (confirmed CR or PR) to the first documentation of tumor progression per RECIST v1.1 or death due to any cause.

secondary_outcome.measure: Progression-free survival (PFS) per RECIST v1.1 by ICR
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From start of treatment to completion of response assessment; approximately 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: The time from the start of study treatment to the first documentation of disease progression per RECIST v1.1 or death due to any cause.

secondary_outcome.measure: PFS per RECIST v1.1 by investigator assessment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From start of treatment to completion of response assessment; approximately 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: The time from the start of study treatment to the first documentation of disease progression per RECIST v1.1 or death due to any cause.

secondary_outcome.measure: Disease control rate (DCR) per RECIST v1.1 by ICR
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From start of treatment to completion of response assessment; approximately 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: The proportion of subjects who have achieved objective response (confirmed CR or PR as per RECIST v1.1 criteria) or stable disease (SD) lasting at least 5 weeks.

secondary_outcome.measure: DCR per RECIST v1.1 by investigator
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From start of treatment to completion of response assessment; approximately 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: The proportion of subjects who have achieved objective response (confirmed CR or PR as per RECIST v 1.1 criteria) or stable disease (SD) lasting at least 5 weeks.

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall survival (OS)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Duration of study; approximately 3 years
secondary_outcome.description: The time from start of study treatment to the date of death due to any cause.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse events (AEs)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Approximately 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: Any untoward medical occurrence in a clinical investigational participant administered a medicinal product and which does not necessarily have a causal relationship with this treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of dose alterations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Approximately 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: To be summarized using descriptive statistics.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of laboratory abnormalities
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Approximately 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: To be summarized using descriptive statistics.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of electrocardiogram (ECG) abnormalities
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Approximately 6 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Approximately 6 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic (PK) parameter of disitamab vedotin (DV) - Area under the curve (AUClast)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through predose of Cycle 5, Day 1; approximately 2 months
secondary_outcome.description: To be summarized using descriptive statistics.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter of DV - Maximum concentration (Cmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through predose of Cycle 5, Day 1; approximately 2 months
secondary_outcome.description: To be summarized using descriptive statistics.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter of DV - Time to maximum concentration (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through predose of Cycle 5, Day 1; approximately 2 months
secondary_outcome.description: To be summarized using descriptive statistics.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter of free monomethyl auristatin E (MMAE) - AUClast
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through predose of Cycle 5, Day 1; approximately 2 months
secondary_outcome.description: To be summarized using descriptive statistics.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter of free MMAE - Cmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through predose of Cycle 5, Day 1; approximately 2 months
secondary_outcome.description: To be summarized using descriptive statistics.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter of free MMAE - Tmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through predose of Cycle 5, Day 1; approximately 2 months
secondary_outcome.description: To be summarized using descriptive statistics.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter of total antibody (TAb) - AUClast
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through predose of Cycle 5, Day 1; approximately 2 months
secondary_outcome.description: To be summarized using descriptive statistics.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter of TAb - Cmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through predose of Cycle 5, Day 1; approximately 2 months
secondary_outcome.description: To be summarized using descriptive statistics.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter of TAb - Tmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through predose of Cycle 5, Day 1; approximately 2 months
secondary_outcome.description: To be summarized using descriptive statistics.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of anti-drug antibodies (ADAs)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Approximately 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: To be summarized using descriptive statistics.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of neutralizing antibodies (NAb)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Approximately 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: To be summarized using descriptive statistics.

intervention.description: Given into the vein (IV; intravenous) every 2 weeks.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Expected survival ≥12 weeks
- Histologically confirmed locally advanced unresectable or metastatic urothelial cancer (UC), including UC originating from the renal pelvis, ureters, bladder, or urethra
- Participant has received 1 or 2 lines of prior treatment for advanced UC, including 1 line of platinum-containing chemotherapy
- Neoadjuvant or adjuvant therapy, with progression within 12 months of completing therapy, is considered a line of prior therapy.
- Maintenance avelumab therapy delivered following first-line platinum therapy is not considered a separate line of therapy.
- Prior therapy with PD-(L)1 inhibitors as (neo)adjuvant therapy, first line maintenance therapy or as second line treatment are allowed
- Radiographically documented disease progression during or after the most recent line of therapy for advanced disease
- At least one measurable lesion based on RECIST version 1.1.
- HER2-expressing status determined by the central laboratory to be IHC 1+, 2+ or 3+, in the most recent archival or fresh tumor sample
- Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status score of 0 or 1
Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to disitamab vedotin or any of its components
- Prior anti-tumor treatment (including chemotherapy, radiotherapy, targeted therapy, immunotherapy etc.) within 3 weeks of start of study
- Toxicity from a previous treatment has not returned to Grade 0-1 (except for Grade 2 alopecia)
- Prior MMAE-based ADCs (eg enfortumab vedotin) or HER2-directed therapy
- Major surgery that has not fully recovered within 4 weeks prior to dose administration
- Peripheral sensory or motor neuropathy ≥ Grade 2 at baseline
- Other malignant tumors within 5 years of study treatment, except for:
- Prostate cancer treated with definitive intent (surgically or with radiation therapy) at ≥ 1 year prior to treatment initiation is acceptable
- Malignancies that can be cured after treatment
There are additional inclusion and exclusion criteria. The study center will determine if criteria for participation are met.
